alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 10:31PM CDT until March 30 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MOBILE COUNTY... At 1031 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Tanner Williams, or 16 miles northwest of Tillmans Corner, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Semmes around 1045 PM CDT. Chunchula around 1105 PM CDT. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
